english.segment1: Rolled out of bed on the right side. Looking up at the big blue sky. Oh yeah-oh yeah. Who I am is what I am. A piece in a part of a bigger plan. Oh yeah-oh yeah
english.segment2: Breathe deep. Taste the moment. Few and far between
english.segment3: [Chorus:]. Days like these-they don't get any better. Let this be for always and forever. Every minute is so perfectly. Just the way that it was meant to be. Days like these-so graceful that I'm falling. On my knees and thanking God for all the. Little things that make me wanna say. How I wish I had a million days like these
english.segment4: Life is running like a dream. I know I can do anything. Oh yeah-oh yeah. Days like this I could believe. The sun is shining just for me. Oh yeah-oh yeah
english.segment5: Eyes closed. Touch the freedom. Never let it go
english.segment7: It's as if I never knew that clouds existed. If there ever was a day to take a chance I'll risk it.
